description: This file is a React component that represents the main page of a weather application, managing state, fetching data, and rendering various subcomponents such as Header, Sidebar, WeatherCard, etc.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Handles search input to set the selected location.

methods.name: handleAddLocation
methods.description: Handles adding a new location, with optimistic UI update and fallback on error.

methods.name: handleRemoveLocation
methods.description: Handles removing a location, with fallback to revert UI on API failure.
